com.googlecode.t7mp

Class RunMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.googlecode.t7mp.AbstractT7BaseMojo
        • com.googlecode.t7mp.AbstractT7TomcatMojo
          • com.googlecode.t7mp.RunMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    T7Configuration, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class RunMojo
extends AbstractT7TomcatMojo
    Runs a Tomcat 7 (or 6) instance in the same process as the maven build.
